comments.body: Are you able to state what that precedence is in terms of the ones at https://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/user_guide/playbooks_variables.html#variable-precedence-where-should-i-put-a-variable (maybe just a link).
well, that list already states 'set_fact' vs 'host fact' are 7 steps away
Fair enough, should have actually gone to that link and read it properly

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +37,41 @@    description:
      - This boolean converts the variable into an actual 'fact' which will also be added to the fact cache, if fact caching is enabled.
      - Normally this module creates 'host level variables' and has much higher precedence, this option changes the nature and precedence
        (by 7 steps) of the variable created.
        https://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/user_guide/playbooks_variables.html#variable-precedence-where-should-i-put-a-variable
